615140.name: Wordlase - Soundtrack
615140.description:
The Official Soundtrack for Wordlase.

It includes a collection of 7 MP3 \ FLAC tracks made by H311.

A Word from the Composer:

“I hope that you will like my music and it will become a part of your life, helping to relax from the bustle.” – H311

Track List:
  • Life
  • Humanity
  • Solitude
  • Tunguska
  • Back to Earth
  • We Are Space
  • Red Signal

Please note – The Wordlase: Official Soundtrack will be placed in your Wordlase folder in the Steam Directory: ...Steam\steamapps\common\Wordlase\Wordlase OST
615140.supported_languages: 英语, 德语, 俄语, 乌克兰语
